name: server
description: This server is built using Node.js and uses MongoDB for its database. It is used as an instance for my web application in my thesis project, which allows users to perform various actions related to creating relevant queries to find news web content. The server processes incoming requests from users and processes them according to the logic implemented in the Node.js code. It also connects to a MongoDB database to retrieve and store data as needed.
main: e functioning of my web application and serves as the server infrastructure that allows users to interact with the content and features of the application.
author: Stetsenko Bohdan IV-93
